data.description: A complete, easy to use date and time object
data.similar:
Lots of them, but none of them work with each other, and none are
    complete. It's a mess.
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
There's been a _lot_ of discussion of this on the datetime@perl.org
    list. The main reason to avoid the existing Date:: and Time::
    namespaces is that the goal is for everything in DateTime::* to
    actually work together, as opposed to the existing date and time
    modules, none of which are designed to be inter-operable.
